name: CollectWise
long_description:
CollectWise automates late-stage debt recovery with AI. Weâ€™re outperforming collection firms by 2X and have successfully serviced over $2 million in debts.

Our AI agents allow creditors to recover charged-off debt after their internal teams have exhausted all other collection efforts. We automate every step of the late-stage recovery process, including credit reporting, legal servicing, direct outreach, and enforcement actions like garnishments and liens.
one_liner: Automating late-stage debt recovery with AI
